name: Super Saiyan GT
description:
Super Saiyan GT is a classic Idle PRG game that allows you to recall your childhood and be a superhero. We look forward to you joining our Super Saiyan base camp and looking for a different passion together.
Introduction
You can match the lineup or character in your favor.
You can also collect your favorite characters by drawing cards.
Each character has a different soul bond.
When we collect 7 dragon balls, we can make a wish to the Shenron and get different surprises
Let's protect the peace and justice of the universe together and defeat the darkness. looking forward to your joining!! let us fight together!!
***Game Feature***
[No scheduled tasks, get rid of the shackles]
1. Doesn’t set the timed tasks, get rid of the depression of fixed-point check-in
2. Don’t need to worry about missing activities and revenue
[ Different camps and matches]
1. Advanced lineup mechanics
2. The bond relationship of character.
3. Be Free to match lineup and skills
[Popular character ]
1. More than 100 popular characters are freely cultivated, and you can customize your personalized camp collocation as you like.
2. Each character's attributes and skills have their own strengths, which can activate some surprise effects and turn the tide of battle at critical moments.
[Refused to be a worker, role training is simple]
1. Offline hang-up to get resources
2. Simple cultivation mechanism
